name: Machita Chima 町田ちま / Nijisanji
description:
weight 0.55~0.65 is best.

Adding "animal on head" to the prompt creates a hamster "Gonzales" on Chima's head.

But the expression of the hamster "Gonzales" is not good. That's why I don't recommend that prompt.

(I am attaching some sample images.)
